name: Fun Coloring Pages for Adults
description:
Awaken the inner child. Get Coloring Pages for Adults app and LET YOUR IMAGINATION FLY. Mandalas, animals, butterflies - make a choice and start coloring!

Coloring for adults has lately been very popular and, with adult coloring book apps, it has become available at any moment, any place. What you have here is the ultimate colouring book for adults with lots of different categories: mandala pictures to color, animal and butterfly coloring pages, Valentines coloring sheets and many others. Whether you are at home or on a bus and whenever you feel blue, these detailed coloring pages will occupy your mind and act as color therapy. Mandalas are great anti-stress coloring pages and painting animal drawings makes time fly by. So, wait no more. Coloring Pages for Adults app is ready to sweep you off your feet with its amazing pictures to color!

◀ FEATURES: ▶

◆ Background music on/off
◆ Multiple color palettes
◆ My palette - create your own palette of colors
◆ Various shades and color nuances
◆ Variety of filters and textures to apply to your colouring page
◆ 100+ coloring pages
◆ Different categories with lots of pictures to color
◆ Share your art on Facebook, Twitter and/or Instagram
◆ My works: save your art in a private gallery
◆ Zoom in for detailed colouring

People like painting. There is something about mixing colors that makes us fulfilled and calm. Unfortunately, not everybody is given the talent for it. That's why there are coloring sheets for adults and coloring games for kids. You just have to pick a drawing and get started. And because you are not always able to take a coloring book and pencils out of your purse and start adding color to a white sheet of paper, there are coloring apps. Some nice people invented them. No mess, no stress, just a coloring book with lots of different nuances in the palettes and so many different pictures to color. So get anti-stress Coloring Pages for Adults. Your inner child will be grateful.

◀ ADVANTAGES OF ADULT COLORING PAGES ▶

Adult coloring books can help us combat stress and boost mental clarity. That is why some people call them anti-stress coloring books or zen coloring pages. Coloring is a smart way to promote creative thinking and personality development. Working with your hands is one of the best ways to soothe anxiety, eliminate stress and calm the mind. Research has proven that calming coloring books for adults can be a cathartic escape from everyday things that cause stress.
Adult colouring books have so many uses and purposes that many are not aware of. They can be used for better focus, therapy, relaxation, to calm the mind, solve problems, and improve personal organizational skills. In other words, adult coloring books are a great way to achieve inner stillness. There are millions of people around the world to prove how relaxing coloring pages can be for an adult.
